channel.title: Skill XP rates
channel.description: I have searched all over and the only guides i can find on are on combat, I need to figure out how to change the xp given for a log or catching a fish. The woodcutting on my server is extremely slow....if someone could tell me where to even look it would help thanks.

item.title: Skill XP rates
item.dc:creator: @infallibl3 infallibl3
item.description:
@infallibl3 wrote:

yes. uhm, I cant change per log, but this is where you change the xp rate for the entire skill:

right, I don’t know which base youre using, but in PI you wanna go src > server > config and search

otherwise, I’d just search

in your source and see what comes up. change the number at the end to a higher number to increase the rate.

Read full topic
